title: An assessment of the environmental radiation risk from the petrologic units of north-eastern Nigeria; an insight from aero-radiometric data interpretation
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Abubakar Yusuf, Lim Hwee San, Mustapha Adejo Mohammed, Ibrahim Saleh Bute, Adeyinka Olasehinde, Ali Garba Mohammed, Ibrahim Abdulkarim Kwami, Abdulwahab Muhammad Bello, Musa Bappah Usman, Mohammed Bashir Sulaiman, Auwalu Dalha, Usman Abubakar, Shehu Mukkafa, Jonathan Barka, Miranda Nchang Mboringong
